name: virtualization-cloud-sec-workshop3
description: A presentation for workshop of cloud security

scripts.start: reveal-md -w  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --port 1337 --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md
scripts.build: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md --static public
scripts.pdf: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md --print presentation.pdf

author: Nero Siar
